subject: America's Cup
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The Kiwis clung pugnaciously and cleverly to the favored right side of the course and the slight lead they earned on the opening leg of the Louis Vuitton Cup finals.
snippet: The Kiwis clung pugnaciously and cleverly to the favored right side of the course and the slight lead they earned on the opening leg of the Louis Vuitton Cup finals.
